description: This PHP source file manages Wi-Fi network configuration for a gateway device, including radio settings, SSIDs, security modes, WPS, and band steering. It contains embedded HTML, JavaScript, and PHP code to display and modify wireless configurations.

methods.name: update_Wi_Fi_control_list
methods.description: AJAX call to update Wi-Fi control list based on selected SSID.

methods.name: set_config
methods.description: Sends configuration data via AJAX to update wireless settings.

methods.name: show_extch
methods.description: Displays extra channel options based on selected channel.

methods.name: check_add
methods.description: Validates device name and MAC address for adding new control list entries.

methods.name: adjust_row
methods.description: Recalculates row numbering and style for a table.

methods.name: add_row
methods.description: Adds a new device entry to a control list table.

methods.name: del_row
methods.description: Deletes a device entry from a control list table.

methods.name: add_auto
methods.description: Copies an auto-learned device to control list.

methods.name: save_enable
methods.description: Saves radio or WPS enable/disable setting.

methods.name: showSteeringHistoryDialog
methods.description: Displays band steering history in a dialog.

methods.name: steering_history
methods.description: Fetches and displays band steering history via AJAX.
